mapper.insert: insert into member(memid, mempw, memnn, memtel, memmail) values(#{memID}, #{memPW}, #{memNN}, #{memTel}, #{memMail})
mapper.update: update member set mempw = #{newPW} where memid = #{memID} and mempw = #{memPW}
mapper.select: select * from member m, board b where m.memid = b.memid and m.memid = #{memID}
SELECT count(*) from favorite f join board b on f.boardid = b.boardid join member m on m.memid = f.memid join image i on i.boardid = b.boardid where m.memid = #{memID} and i.imagetype = 'thumbnail'

SELECT b.memid, b.boardid, b.boardtitle, i.imagetype, i.imagepath from favorite f join board b on f.boardid = b.boardid join member m on m.memid = f.memid join image i on i.boardid = b.boardid where m.memid = #{memID} and i.imagetype = 'thumbnail'
